alert.note: Alert for Greene; Monroe; Owen (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 25 at 11:41AM EDT until March 27 at 2:36PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... East Fork White River at Seymour. White River at Spencer, Hazleton, Newberry, Petersburg, Edwardsport, and Elliston. .Multiple rounds of rain over the past few weeks has lead to lowland flooding along the entire length of the Wabash River, on most of the White River from Spencer downstream, and on the East Fork White River at Seymour. Flooding on the Wabash River is expected to last as late as April 3, on the White River until as late as April 1, and on the East Fork White River until March 26. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...White River at Spencer. * WHEN...Until early Sunday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 17.2 feet, High water affects Owen County Fairgrounds parking lot and county roads in the Freedom area. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:30 AM EDT Friday the stage was 17.3 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:30 AM EDT Friday was 17.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early Sunday morning and continue falling to 7.0 feet Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. This statement will be updated within the next 12 to 24 hours.
